TextView.android:text: The application consists of three difficulty level. But must passed the tutorial stage first before proceeding to the Easy level which is the first level. After completing the easy level, the user can advance to medium level and so on to the hard level of difficulty which is the last. Each of these stages requires a specific amount of score in order for the user to excel to another level. A wireless glove connected to the app via bluetooth is provided to input users's answer in each activity.
